item.title: VSCode Build With Multiple Commands
item.description: In the past few weeks, I became familiar with LitElement. I love the starter kit, but I hate to start up the manual build tasks. Nowadays, I work with VSCode a lot, so I tried to devise a convenient vendor locked-in solution for a change.

item.title: Markdown Slideshow
item.description: Today I’ve found an awesome library, called reveal.js, that lets me create slideshows in markdown format. It has a VSCode plugin, that is intuitive to use. My main purpose was to create a slideshow in plaintext format, and this lib exceeded my hopes.
